channel.title: NEED an actual working blitzbot/blocker
channel.description:
Ok...everyone keeps crashing/spamming my server with a freaking blitzbot...(similar to AGF bot) in a way...and im freaking sick it
Can anyone help me code a blitzbot, a AGF bot blocker (if there is a way). I really need help, please help.
